title: Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Agriculture, Food and the Marine
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Agriculture, Food and the Marine 

(Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited agriculture food marine (delegation ministerial functions) order 2025

title: Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 

the Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine conferred on him – 

(a) 

by or under the enactments specified in Part 1 of the Schedule, 
and 

(b) under the Regulations specified in Part 2 of the Schedule, 

are delegated to Michael Healy-Rae, Minister of State at the Department of 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [244] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister agriculture food marine conferred - (a) enactment specified part 1 schedule (b) regulation specified part 2 schedule delegated michael healy-rae minister state department agriculture food marine notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 6th june 2025 244 3

title: Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977),
heading: Destructive Insects and Pests (Consolidation) Act 1958 (No. 11 of 1958)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Part 1 

Destructive Insects and Pests (Consolidation) Act 1958 (No. 11 of 1958) 

Destructive Insects and Pests (Amendment) Act 1991 (No. 4 of 1991) 

Forestry Act 1988 (No. 26 of 1988) 

Forestry Act 2014 (No. 31 of 2014) 

Subsections (1A) and (1B) of section 14A of the Agriculture Appeals Act 2001 
(No. 29 of 2001) 

Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), in so far as it relates to 
bees. 

 
 4 [244] 

Part 2 

European Communities 
Regulations 2002 (S.I. No. 618 of 2002) 

(Marketing of Forest Reproductive Material) 

European Communities (Water Policy) Regulations 2003 (S.I. No. 722 of 2003) 

European Communities Environmental Objectives (Freshwater Pearl Mussel) 
Regulations 2009 (S.I. No. 296 of 2009) 

European Union (Marketing of Vegetable Propagating and Planting Material, 
Other than Seed) Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 152 of 2014) 

European Union (Timber and Timber Products) (Placing on the Market) 
Regulations 2014 (S.I. No. 316 of 2014) 

European Union (FLEGT Licensing Scheme for Imports of Timber) Regulations 
2015 (S.I. No. 251 of 2015) 

European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and Emergency 
Measures on Imports of Food and Feed of Non-animal Origin) Regulations 2020 
(S.I. No. 9 of 2020). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

4 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [244] 5 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR 
Le ceannach díreach ó
